body: "If Warner succeeds in legitimizing the illegal off shoot of public transport at the demise of law abiding members, how long before we are a completely lawless State?": Plain Talk blogs about the first day of the Maxi Taxi strike.
original_body: "If Warner succeeds in legitimizing the illegal off shoot of public transport at the demise of law abiding members, how long before we are a completely lawless State?": Plain Talk blogs about the first day of the Maxi Taxi strike.
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Taxi Strike

sentence: "If Warner succeeds in legitimizing the illegal off shoot of public transport at the demise of law abiding members, how long before we are a completely lawless State?": Plain Talk blogs about the first day of the Maxi Taxi strike.
